title: Conspiracy behind APC: Sajith
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa today alleged of a conspiracy behind the All-Party Conference, which was held yesterday (23) with the participation of several parties regarding the future course of action of Sri Lanka and its economy.
Parliamentarians also expressed their views regarding the All-Party Conference, at the Parliament today (24).

The Minister of Agriculture, Mahindananda Aluthgamage stated that the Opposition members sitting on the side of the Government is a pipe dream, however they will soon go and stand with former Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe.

The Leader of the Opposition Sajith Premadasa then proceeded to comment the Minister for openly stating that there was a conspiracy behind the All-Party Conference and emphasized that the people of the country will take the right decision at the right time to entrust a party with the responsibility of advancing this country out of the economic abyss.
